location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires, Teheran [Tehran]

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, informs Henry Willock, His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires, Teheran [Tehran], that Willock's letters and packets have been sent to the Presidency via HMS Alligator. Stannus acknowledges the receipt of a royal firman, addressed to His Royal Highness the Prince of Shirauz [Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mīrzā, Prince of Shiraz], which directed that the same attention be paid to Stannus as to former Residents.
